sentences.english: An Afghan hound stands at attention.
sentences.chinese: 一隻阿富汗獵犬昂首肅立。

sentences.english: Bucca is a 2 year old golden retriever.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的狗狗，布卡，是一隻兩歲的黃金獵犬。

sentences.english: My father told me about the Hound of the Baskervilles.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親告訴了我有關巴斯克維爾獵犬的情況。

sentences.english: The hound picked up the fox's smell and started to chase after it.
sentences.chinese: 獵犬嗅出了狐狸的氣味，便開始跟蹤追趕。

sentences.english: The pup looked to be a cross between a Lab and a German shepherd.
sentences.chinese: 看起來是拉布拉多獵犬和德國牧羊犬交配的品種。

sentences.english: Dog Bark Park Inn is a bed & breakfast guest house inside the World's Biggest Beagle.
sentences.chinese: 犬吠公園酒店藏在一個世界上最大的小獵犬裏面。

sentences.english: He believed the story of the Hound of the Baskervilles.
sentences.chinese: 他相信巴斯克維爾獵犬的故事。

sentences.english: How did Selden know that the hound was following him?
sentences.chinese: 塞爾登如何知道那獵犬跟在他後面呢？

sentences.english: These genetically cloned Afghan hounds in South Korea have made history.
sentences.chinese: 這是韓國科學家克隆的阿富汗獵犬。

sentences.english: The hound hunted all night. He quit when the roosters started crowing at daybreak.
sentences.chinese: 那隻獵犬忙乎了整晚，到黎明公雞報曉時才休息。

sentences.english: Always remember that the Borzoi is a coursing Sighthound and follows its instinct to chase.
sentences.chinese: 請牢記，獵狼是視覺獵犬，他會追尋他的本能去獵捕。

sentences.english: 'These dogs were bred to hunt, ' says Mr. Lackey, 45 years old.
sentences.chinese: 雷基說，“這兩條狗是天生的好獵犬。”

sentences.english: The hound found a profound book on the roundabout.
sentences.chinese: 獵犬在旋轉木馬上找到一本深奧的書。

sentences.english: The hounds followed the stag's scent.
sentences.chinese: 那羣獵犬循臭味追尋牡鹿。

sentences.english: Beagles are genetically wired to be opportunistic eaters.
sentences.chinese: 小獵犬狗天生是一位機會主義進食者。

sentences.english: The hound nips at a rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 獵犬在野兔身後緊追不捨。

definition: Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
